name: Galixo
tag_list: tech, mobile, digital, app, smartphone, tablet, web, internet, global, consulting, strategy, engineering, reengineering, business, marketing, experience, creativity, market, metrics, monetization, design, usability, business-model, branding, pr, media
overview:
Galixo designs disruptive business strategies for startups and enterprises in the tech, digital and mobile space. We are a boutique consultancy helping clients innovate, accelerate and grow in existing and new markets.

Our team is spread all over the world to ensure a global approach to business and technology. Our network of local experts with specific skills and industry knowledge allow us to deliver the best solutions to our clients. Our global immersion, understanding of local markets and ecosystems make us able to spot emerging trends and players.

We have a multi-disciplinary approach. Our team has strong experience and knowledge in four areas: Experience (DNA, branding, UX/design, marketing); Business (analytics, insight, models, monetization); Technology (trends, systems, processes, UI); and Action (planning, testing, implementation, operation review).

Our strength resides in brainstormed ideas, insights and findings, local markets knowledge, business concepts, innovative models, action plans, growth hacking and testing strategy. Also by connecting our clients to our global execution network, with we provide rapid expansion and distribution to over 20 key markets across 5 continents.

We offer five key services that are all interrelated: - Experience Design (Xd) - Model Generation (Md) - ReEngineering (Re) - Operations Accelerations (Oa) - GoGlobal (Gg). We are also able to design tailored solutions based on our client’s needs.

Reengineering is part of our DNA: Our learning culture means that our services and methodology are designed to change, develop, and grow.

offices.address1: The Hub Singapore - National Youth Council Academy
